dashboard.label: Guided Data Onboarding
dashboard.description: Guidance on how to ingest top data sources into a specific Splunk deployment environment.

html.p: Guided Data Onboarding is a new feature helping Splunk users understand the crucial concepts of how to get data from their desired sources into Splunk. It then guides the user to the appropriate onboarding approach based on the users specific Splunk deployment environment.

ul.li: Search for top data sources or select from category of data sources
View high level steps and details to setup and configuration a source from the device or server to Splunk

html.p: Choose from a variety of popular sources to ingest from.
Receive guidance on suggested collection methods, required environment configuration, and steps to validate data ingestion.
